name: Dog and the Walkers
description:
Dog and the Walkers

Life is good. 

You're working your dream job running a dog salon. No matter how many customers leave your shop smiling, no matter how many dogs you help, you're plagued by a sense of unease. The end is coming. 

Nuclear apocalypse? Aliens? Zombies? You're not sure. All you know is that you must be prepared when the time comes.

Made for MiniJam 54: Memories in 3 days. The limitation was that the game must start and end as different genres, so our game alternates between a top-down shooter and a fast-paced simulation / tycoon.

Controls

WASD to move. Pick up with (E). Interact with (F).  Use the mouse to aim and shoot and to move or reorder dog tickets.

Credits

Programming by flaxbeard, hassang2, 42mileslong

Art by reikabow

Music by Rolemusic (May and Crush at Maracas Bar) and Komiku (Quiet Saturday)
